CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. polymer solar cells (PCE)
2. 9,9-dialkylfluorene
3. 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties
4. 9,9-dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers
5. spirobifluorene
6. spirobifluorene-based copolymers

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. 9,9-dialkylfluorene
2. spirobifluorene

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 9,9-dialkylfluorene |
| spirobifluorene |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 PCE of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties has been improved to 4.5% with an open circuit voltage ( V oc ) of almost 1 V. 10 Compared with the large number of publications on 9,9dialkylfluorene based D-A alternating copolymers applied in PSCs , less attention was paid to spirobifluorene - based copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. "4.5%" - This is the percentage of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties that has been improved.
2. "1 V" - This is the open circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells.

These entities are property values because they represent a quantitative measure of the performance of the polymer solar cells, specifically the percentage improvement in efficiency and the open circuit voltage.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "4.5%" - This is the percentage of polymer solar cells based on 9,9-dialkylfluorene moieties that has been improved.
2. "1 V" - This is the open circuit voltage (Voc) of the polymer solar cells.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 4.5% |
| 1 V |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
